titleStmt.title: A learned and very useful commentary on the whole epistle to the Hebrews wherein every word and particle in the original is explained ... : being the substance of thirty years Wednesdayes lectures at Black-fryers, London / by that holy and learned divine Wiliam Gouge ... : before which is prefixed a narrative of his life and death : whereunto is added two alphabeticall tables ...
titleStmt.author: Gouge, William, 1578-1653.

titleStmt.title: A learned and very useful commentary on the whole epistle to the Hebrews wherein every word and particle in the original is explained ... : being the substance of thirty years Wednesdayes lectures at Black-fryers, London / by that holy and learned divine Wiliam Gouge ... : before which is prefixed a narrative of his life and death : whereunto is added two alphabeticall tables ...
titleStmt.author: Gouge, William, 1578-1653.
Gouge, Thomas, 1605-1681.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by A.M., T.W. and S.G. for Joshua Kirton,

notesStmt.note: Half of one chapter finished after the author's death by his son, who also added the life of the author and the tables--Cf. The epistle to the Christian reader, signed Tho. Gouge.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
